RelatedSentence: Demand for ' cosmetic surgery tourism ' has risen as the number of people travelling overseas for treatments has more than doubled in the past two years , according to new research by private healthcare search engine WhatClinic.com .
The ability to get cheaper treatments is the main reason more people are opting to have dentures , boob jobs and bottom lifts abroad .
